title: System identification of nonlinear state-space models

tldr.text: A Maximum Likelihood (ML) framework is employed and an Expectation Maximisation (EM) algorithm is derived to compute these ML estimates, which lend itself perfectly to the particle smoother, which provides arbitrarily good estimates.
